topic.title: Dell | Cloudera Apache Hadoop Solutions Reference Architecture
topic.shortdesc: You must obtain, and have a thorough understanding of, the Dell | Cloudera Apache Hadoop Solutions Reference Architecture.

body.p: The reference architecture provides detailed descriptions of the solution, its hardware and software components, and deployment methodologies that you should consider. Please contact your Dell sales representative to obtain a copy of the Dell | Cloudera Apache Hadoop Solutions Reference Architecture.
